titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March 2015 as "National Cheerleading Safety Month".
Expressing support for designation of March 2015 as "National Cheerleading Safety Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Expresses support for: (1) the designation of National Cheerleading Safety Month, (2) efforts to educate cheerleaders on the importance of safety, and (3) efforts to promote measures to increase cheerleader safety.
